actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain property located within the Governor's Land Archeological District, James City County, Va., for inclusion in the Colonial National Historical Park.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire property located within the Governor's Land Archeological District, James City County, Virginia, for inclusion in the Colonial National Historical Park. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to make the acquisitions by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain property located within the Governor's Land Archeological District, James City County, Va., for inclusion in the Colonial National Historical Park.
